00019 EnumeratedValue::EnumeratedValue(QDomNode& enumerationNode):
00020 usage_(EnumeratedValue::READWRITE), name_(), displayName_(), description_(),
00021 value_(0) {
00022 
00023         // parse the spirit:usage attribute
00024         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = enumerationNode.attributes();
00025         QString usage = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:usage")).nodeValue();
00026         usage_ = str2Usage(usage, EnumeratedValue::READWRITE);
00027 
00028         for (int i = 0; i < enumerationNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00029                 QDomNode tempNode = enumerationNode.childNodes().at(i);
00030 
00031                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00032                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00033                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00034 
00035                 }
00036                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00037                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00038                 }
00039                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00040                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00041                 }
00042                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:value")) {
00043                         value_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00044                 }
00045 
00046         }
00047 
00048         // if mandatory name is not specified
00049         if (name_.isNull()) {
00050                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name is missing in spirit:"
00051                                 "enumeratedValue"));
00052         }
00053 
00054         // if mandatory value is missing
00055         if (value_ < 0) {
00056                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing in spirit:"
00057                                 "enumeratedValue"));
00058         }
00059         return;
00060 }

00067 value_(other.value_) {

00070 EnumeratedValue& EnumeratedValue::operator=( const EnumeratedValue& other ) {
00071         if (this != &other) {
00072                 usage_ = other.usage_;
00073                 name_ = other.name_;
00074                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00075                 description_ = other.description_;
00076                 value_ = other.value_;
00077         }
00078         return *this;
00079 }

00085 void EnumeratedValue::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00086         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:enumeratedValue");
00087 
00088         // write the spirit:usage attribute
00089         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:usage", EnumeratedValue::usage2Str(usage_));
00090 
00091         // if mandatory name is missing
00092         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00093                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in spirit:"
00094                                 "enumeratedValue"));
00095         }
00096         else {
00097                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00098         }
00099 
00100         // if optional displayName is defined
00101         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00102                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00103         }
00104 
00105         // is optional description is defined
00106         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00107                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00108         }
00109 
00110         // if mandatory value is not defined
00111         if (value_ <= 0) {
00112                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing in spirit:"
00113                                 "enumeratedValue"));
00114         }
00115         else {
00116                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:value", QString::number(value_));
00117         }
00118 
00119         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:enumeratedValue
00120 }

00172 QString EnumeratedValue::usage2Str(EnumeratedValue::EnumeratedUsage usage) {
00173         switch (usage) {
00174         case EnumeratedValue::READ: {
00175                 return QString("read");
00176         }
00177         case EnumeratedValue::WRITE: {
00178                 return QString("write");
00179         }
00180         case EnumeratedValue::READWRITE: {
00181                 return QString("read-write");
00182         }
00183         // this should never happen
00184         default: {
00185                 return QString();
00186         }
00187         }
00188 }
00189 
00190 EnumeratedValue::EnumeratedUsage EnumeratedValue::str2Usage(
00191                 QString& usage, EnumeratedUsage defaultValue) {
00192         if (usage == QString("read")) {
00193                 return EnumeratedValue::READ;
00194         }
00195         else if (usage == QString("write")) {
00196                 return EnumeratedValue::WRITE;
00197         }
00198         else if (usage == QString("read-write")) {
00199                 return EnumeratedValue::READWRITE;
00200         }
00201         else {
00202                 return defaultValue;
00203         }
00204 }
